title: Web scraping of web pages where the column format is not consistent
snippet:
I need an app to scrape a website daily and the output file to be in Excel format. 

The web links are embedded in the page and I the app can be written in VB

It needs to be a desk top app.

The page has a number of embedded web links which open to show the daily entries. Each web link needs to be opened in sequence. 

When the web links are opened the column format of the pages are  different.

Please can you let me know if you need any more  information
